inn1.comm: full and wide, driven straight off the front foot to short cover
angled in this time from outside off, he defends it back
swinging into the batsman from outside off, just short of length and he defends again
angled in further towards the pads and Masakadza glances it fine down the leg side for four
towards the off stump now on length, he blocks it back
slightly slower and well outside off, left alone easily
swing and a miss! Short of length outside off and swinging away, Raza chases and misses
full and wide outside off, swinging away further, Raza leans into it and drives uppishly wide of point for a four in the gap
slightly closer to the stumps, pitched on back of length and swung away after pitching, Raza chased and missed again
too full again outside off and Raza crunches it through the covers off the front foot for a cracking four
angled in toward the pads, pushed to mid on for a single
back of length and rising towards the batsman, he taps it late towards third man
angles it in towards off stump from back of length, defended back by the batsman
full and on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
short of length outside off, he stays back and defends it
drifts it towards the leg side, worked off the pads to short fine leg
back of length outside the off stump, defends on the off side
drifting down leg again, short of length, tucked to short fine leg and that's a maiden
short of length outside off and swinging away, left alone
fullish on the stumps, pushed into the covers with the outswing
on length outside off, defends into the covers by leaning slightly towards the ball
angled towards the stumps, pushed down to mid on
outside the off stump, taps it towards point
big swing and a miss! Pitched up outside off, he sees room outside off and drives but doesn't connect
takes a step down for the incoming delivery, takes it on the pad outside leg
comes down again and works the ball to deep midwicket with the angle for one
short and wide, chases the short delivery and misses again
sways down the leg side for a wide this time
sharp inswing towards the off stump, Raza stays back and defends it back with no room

it's Mortaza who breaks the opening stand again! Raza chased the delivery outside off to run it down to third man but gave a simple catch to the keeper. It was short of length and shaping away further, Raza shuffled a bit towards off stump and poked to edge it to Mushfiqur
angled into the pads, tucked wide of midwicket in the gap for two
slightly short outside off, Hammy picks the length early and powers a pull between midwicket and mid on for four! He didn't middle it very well, but it had enough power to go all the way
makes room, but the ball shapes away from just outside off as Hammy pokes and misses

charges down, gets a leading edge over backward point and that's also gone for four. Thick outside edge flew in the air and third man reached the ball in time but his foot touched the rope when he held it
back of length outside off, pushed down towards mid off
makes room again but Abul sends it down the leg side for a wide
straight and full and that's driven straight down the ground from off stump for another four. Once Hammy powers a short, nobody can beat it
short of length outside off, defends it back on the off side
back of length outside off, Vusi jabs at the incoming delivery but is beaten
touch wider outside off, punched off the back foot into the covers and Jubair dives to his right to save a couple of runs
oh that's gone all the way, what a six from Hammy! He went down on a knee and almost swept the ball from outside off over the fine leg boundary
wider and fuller outside off, tapped wide of point towards third man for one
wild swing for the slower delivery well outside off, it was full too but he could not connect
outside off with some room, he looked to drive but withdrew at the end
fullish outside off, driven into the covers
flatter on middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket off the back foot for two
bit slower on length outside off, he leans forward and blocks
that's gone high in the air, a fielder is coming under it but it's gone all the way! He charged down the track and didn't connect from the middle but it went over the long off boundary
leans forward and blocks it on the leg side
too short this time, Hammy goes on the back foot and pulls it to the midwicket boundary for four more. Shakib punished in the first over
looks to slice the ball outside off but doesn't connect
short ball with a bit of angle coming in, pulled towards mid on
short and wide outside the off stump, Sibanda joins in by cutting it fiercely past point for four
slightly slower outside off, he waits and punches it to point off the back foot
in the air but falls short of mid on! This one came in from short of length, Sibanda closed the face of the bat on the leg side bit too early and it nearly lobbed to mid on
stays on the back foot and pulls the shortish delivery to deep midwicket. Struggling a bit to complete the second but an overthrow gives them a third too
length delivery on middle stump, swept to deep fine leg
leans forward and blocks the delivery back
shorter outside off, goes back and punches it to cover
towards the leg side now and it's worked to short midwicket off the back foot. A misfield gives them time for a run
comes down a step and the ball lobs off the pad to the leg side
comes down again and pads the ball outside off
bit of flight on off, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on off, driven back to Taijul off the front foot
on length on the stumps, pushed back again
touch shorter on the stumps, worked down to long on for one
appeal for lbw as he leans forward to defend but is struck outside leg and the appeal is turned down
short of length outside off, punched down to long off for one
drifts towards the leg side and it worked to midwicket
goes on the back foot and punches it to sweeper cover
on length on the leg stump, tapped to the leg side for one
goes back and makes room to push it to sweeper cover
too short and slow down the leg side, Hammy goes back and lofts it over the midwicket boundary for six!
stretches forward and blocks back the length delivery
drives the length delivery towards long off but inside edge goes to long on
pushes the length delivery to cover
stretches forward and drives firmly to cover
goes on the back foot now and punches it to cover again
shorter outside off, sliced to point this time
stays in the crease and defends it back to the bowler
length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
leans forward and drives it to sweeper cover
dropped! He goes back in the crease to pull the short ball and it went to midwicket but it was dropped
drives the length delivery outside off, but it keeps low and misses
shorter outside off, he chops it off the back foot to deep point
leans forward and blocks it back
bit of flight on middle and leg, pushed down to long on
on length on the stumps, pushed off the back foot to cover
flighted on the stumps, leans forward and takes a single by tapping it towards point
flighted outside off, driven down to long off for one
cuts it off the back foot to point from the stumps
leans forward and pushes towards point for one
goes back and pulls it behind square on the leg side for two
fullish outside off, driven through the covers
towards the leg side now, worked towards midwicket and that's his fifty
full and outside off, driven straight to point
full and wide again, he gets more room and drives it firmly through the covers for four
flighted outside off, he leaves it alone
flighted on off, pushed back to the bowler
draws the outside edge as he drives outside off
comes down the track and defends on the leg side
goes back this time and works it down to long on
leans forward and blocks the ball back
flighted on the off stump, blocks it on the off side
on length outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
too short on the stumps and Sibanda rocks back to pull it to the midwicket boundary for four! Bangladesh have bowled too many of these already
flighted and full outside off, driven nicely to sweeper cover for one
that's a googly and he's got Masakadza, the big wicket! It was flighted outside off, Masakadza drove with a big gap between bat and pad and the ball sneaked in through that
tossed up delivery outside off, driven through the covers for one
down the leg side and it's deflected to short fine leg
defends the ball softly towards point for one but there's no time
on the stumps this time, defends it on the leg side
comes down the track and defends it back again
shorter on the leg side, worked to backward square leg for one
fuller on the stumps, driven down to long off for one
comes down a step and flicks to deep fine leg, but with an edge in the gap
flighted outside off, he leans forward and defends
fuller outside off, driven down to long off for one
full and flighted outside off, driven handsomely by going down on one knee to sweeper cover
outside off, there's enough room and Taylor places it beautifully by chipping in over the covers in the gap for four
fuller on off stump, worked down to long on for one
flighted and full outside off, flicked down to long on for one more
on length on middle and leg, hits him on the pad outside leg
comes down the track and drives the ball down to long off
oh, Shakib has struck, Taylor is bowled! Shakib slid the ball in from outside off on length, Taylor pushed it outside off but missed the ball and it hit top of off stump
stays back and defends the ball on the off side
slides the ball in from outside off, looks to defend but is hit high on the pads
fullish outside off, driven straight to cover
further outside off, he chases and drives to sweeper cover for one
full and wide outside off, driven nicely but straight to cover
leans towards the ball outside off and pushes to point
on length outside off, reaches out to push it to cover

loud appeal for lbw, for a second it looked like the umpire gave it out but changed his mind in the end! The googly turned in form outside off, Mire looked to defend and was hit on the pads. Replays show there was an inside edge
drives the fullish ball straight to cover
comes down and gets a thick outside edge towards point
leans forward and blocks it on leg
comes down the track and digs it out down the ground, Shakib does well to stop the ball
another one for Shakib and a very good catch from Mortaza! Sibanda went back for the short ball, pulled to midwicket where Mortaza dived to his right
leans forward and gets an inside edge on the pads as Shakib appeals
short and flat outside off, punched to cover
googly coming in from outside off, cuts it to sweeper cover for one
leans forward outside off and the ball spins away from length
turns it away again from outside off, he lets it go
goes on the back foot and defends it back
doesn't move much this time and blocks the ball on off side
stretches forward a bit and pushes the ball behind square on off
goes on the back foot to work it on leg but hits short leg's leg
goes back and works it down on the leg side again
shorter on the stumps and it's pushed to mid on for one
beats the edge! It was on length outside off, he leaned forward to defend and it spun away to beat the bat
slides it down leg and it's worked to fine leg for one
flighted well outside off, driven down to mid off
that's gone through, bowled'im! Maruma went on the back foot to defend it but it was a flipper which came in, it was flat and beat the bat which came down late to hit off stump
takes a step down and drives it to long off
flighted and full, that's launched straight down the ground over the umpire's head from outside off for a six! It was a googly actually
shorter outside off, pushed off the back foot to sweeper cover
googly turns in from outside off, he defends off the back foot

strikes on his first ball when he's back! It was a flat delivery sliding in after pitching on off, came in with the angle and went past the bat to hit him in front of middle and leg, umpire says it's out. First ODI wicket for Taijul
flat again outside off, Panyangara defends off the back foot
length delivery outside off, he leans forward to defend this time
tries to cut this one outside off but misses
slices the flat delivery outside off to point

one more, sneaks it through the gap! Panyangara stretched forward to defend the flighted delivery that didn't turn away but came in slightly with the angle and found the gap between bat and pad to hit the stumps. Kept a little low too
length delivery outside off, pushed to sweeper cover for one
googly comes in from outside off, Nyumbu goes back and works it to leg for two
turns away from length outside off, left alone
goes back again and defends the ball on the off side
loud appeal for another googly that came in from just outside off and hit him just outside off, good decision by the umpire
short ball is pulled off the back foot to fine leg for one
oh given lbw, one more for Taijul! It was flat and sliding in towards the stumps, the batsman went on the back foot but was hit right in front of the stumps and umpire gives it out

oh he's got it, he's got three in three on debut, the crowd erupts, Taijul leaps in joy! Chatara went down on a knee to slog the ball on the leg side, missed it completely and the ball angled in to the off stump
fullish on off stump, pushed on the off side
shorter outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
defends the length ball tentatively on the off side
goes on the back foot again and pushes it to off
slides the ball in towards the leg side, he makes room and pushes it down to long off
slides it down leg again, wide this time
goes on the back foot and slices the ball to point
flighted on the stumps and that's lofted with a leading edge towards midwicket in the gap for two
shorter outside off and turning away, he makes room and defends
just misses the stumps! He went for the slog on the leg side, the ball angled in just missed the leg stump

that's it, the innings has been wrapped up! Kamungozi leaned forward for the delivery outside off, it turned away and bounced enough to get the shoulder of the bat to go to first slip for an easy catch

inn2.comm: angles it across from length outside off, left alone with a forward lean
much shorter and wider outside off, he chases and misses
goes down the leg side this time for a wide, good take by Taylor
length delivery on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket for one
back of length outside off, defends it off the back foot
on length outside off, left alone easily
back of length towards the stumps now, defends off the back foot on the leg side
swings it down the leg side for a wide
straighter down the leg side for another wide
angled across outside off from short of length, that's punched off the back foot handsomely between point and cover point for four. Cracking shot!
wider outside off and it's left alone
on length on middle and leg, defends it back on the leg side
on the pads on length, worked to the midwicket region for one
beautiful delivery with pace and bounce outside off! Anamul poked outside off, the short of length ball held its line and took off to beat the bat
wider outside the off stump and it's left alone
angled across the batsman from outside off, left alone
bouncer on the leg stump as Tamim hooks, goes over his head for a wide
fullish outside off and that's driven nicely down the ground to beat a wide mid off for four
angling away outside the off stump, left with a forward lean
touch shorter on the off stump, angles away past the batsman
well outside off, Tamim sees room and swishes nicely but finds point
stifled appeal as the ball swung in from outside off, probably hit him outside off before going down to mid off off the bat
good bounce again for Chatara! Back of length outside off, swings away and bounces enough to beat the bat
short and wide outside off, Anamul cuts uppishly and finds point after a bounce
short and wide again, he taps it down softly to point this time
on length outside the off stump, pushed into the covers
short of length and wide, enough room and gap for Anamul to punch it off the front foot through covers for four
on length and wide outside off, shuffles across and defends it on off
charges down the track for a wild slog and misses the ball that pitched on off and angled away

wide delivery outside off and he finds third man, Tamim is gone! It was full and wide outside off, Tamim swished at it without much footwork with a drive and a leading edge flew down to third man for an easy catch
what a delivery to welcome the new batsman! Nasty bouncer on the stumps, Sarkar looked to defend on his toes but the ball went past the gloves with good bounce
fullish outside off, he chipped it in the air but just wide of cover
straying on the pads and Anamul has glanced it away to the fine leg boundary
tries to limit the room available to the batsman, but Sarkar is able to nudge it off his thighs to deep square leg

and one of them comes into play! Anamul has been squared up and the edge is safely pouched. Oddly enough the ball was rather wide outside off, but the batsman had got into an awful position. His legs went leg side, his hands pushed at the ball and Masakadza happily converted the chance at first slip
goes wide of the crease and targets the base of off stump, Mahmudullah defends with an open face
fuller delivery a shade outside off, Mahmudullah steps forward to block
another beaut! Chatara's angle is causing a little strife here, as he pitches just back of a length and then jags away as Mahmudullah pokes
pushes out towards a good length ball outside off and taps it into the covers
fuller delivery outside off, Sarkar moves across towards it and was prepared to hit it on the up. Risky boundary square on the off side, but he did not overhit it.
goes short and a shade outside off, Sarkar sways away
good length ball outside off is caressed through point with an open face. He sets up for that square drive quite well
fuller delivery on middle, Mahmudullah clips to midwicket

digs it in short on middle and leg, Mahmudullah goes for a hook but is beaten. Got the ball to lift towards Mahmudullah's throat, but he had moved inside the line to protect himself and simultaneously enable the shot
back over the wicket and delivers a fuller delivery on off stump, gets it to straighten and claim Mahmudullah's outside edge. Closed the bat face too soon
leans forward and slices a fuller ball outside off to deep third man
short and wide, Mahmudullah chops it away to deep point
shuffles across and blocks into the covers
back of a length and outside off, left for the keeper
sways away from the line of a shortish delivery outside off and a whip of his wrists on top of the bounce sends the ball racing away to the third man boundary. Brilliantly late upper cut
and the bowler replies quite strongly. Pins him back with a bouncer that has Sarkar on his tip toes. Strikes the splice of the bat and lobs up towards the covers

fuller delivery on middle and leg, Mahmudullah shuffles inside the line and looks to flick. Moved a little too much for that and is struck on the pads. Big appeal from behind the stumps, but that would have slid down
sweetly driven to mid-off as he steps forward to a fuller ball outside off
good length ball on off stump, defended
lands a good yorker on off stump, but Sarkar is able to dig it out
another upper cut! Sarkar is not going to back off from bouncers, leaps up off his feet and slashes at the ball because of the width it had and helps it to the third man boundary
continues with the short-ball barrage and Sarkar attempts another ramp shot over the cordon. Swayed inside the line and swiveled his bat, but he misses
back of a length and a shade outside off, Chatara's angle from wide of the crease prompts Mahmudullah to poke at something he needn't have. Beaten
fuller delivery on off stump, defended
leans forward and defends a fullish delivery on off stump with an open face. Secures a single, but a poor throw at the keeper's end gifts a second run
length ball on middle and leg, Mahmudullah clips to the short leg fielder
guides the ball wide of the man at gully
the plan has worked! Sarkar jumps across outside off to try and tickle a short ball towards fine leg and forgets about Sikandar Raza who was lurking close-in. Chatara is overjoyed
poor line from Panyangara and all the batsman had to do was roll his wrists and clip the fullish delivery off his pads t othe fine leg boundary
good length ball on off stump, defended
worked away to the left of deep fine leg, Mahmudullah's timing seems to be working now
shortish and outside off, Shakib flashes and misses
shortish and a shade outside off as Panyangara moves around the stumps, Shakib slices towards point
seeks the yorker on off stump, Shakib leans forward and protects it
back of a length and outside off, not bothered with
lovely stroke by Mahmudullah as he leans forward and drives through the covers.
dug in shortish on middle and off, Mahmudullah swivels on his back foot and clips it to deep fine leg
dug in short and slanted across Shakib, who ducks under it
that's one for the over, says the umpire after Chatara delivers a good short ball that sails over Shakib's pull. Too quick for him
dug in short again and Shakib evades it to collect the wide
full on middle and off, stoutly defended
shortish and a shade outside off, Shakib stays beside it and chops to gully. Timed it quite well, but the fielder was up for the challenge
full and sliding down leg, Mahmudullah goes for a flick but falls over while playing a flick. Struck on the pads but it would have slid down

caught at first slip on the rebound! But before Shakib walks off, the umpire wants to take a second look at the front foot, which is completely fine. It was full and wide, teasing the batsman to play an extravagant drive. He had not covered the line, it was just his hands going at the ball and the thick edge is pouched rather well by Hami M
back of a length on off stump, defended to short leg
fuller delivery outside off, Mushy gets forward to block into the covers
goes short on middle, but Mushy bends under it
shortish and outside off, Mushy went up on his toes and taps it behind point
back of a length and slid down leg, Mahmudullah looks for a flick but cannot connect
dug in short and way down leg, Mahmudullah pulls it down to the fine leg boundary. Easy put away as Zimbabwe suffer a lapse in discipline
goes short on middle and off, Mahmudullah goes back and pulls into the gap between leg gully and short leg. Well controlled but there is protection in the deep
good length ball pushed across the right-hander, Mushy covers his stumps and leaves
fullish and on the legs, Mushy looks to tickle it through square leg but that man at short leg dives to his left to try and manufacture a catch. Unable to
he's been hit on the helmet! The side of it actually, but Mahmudullah smiles immediately. The bouncer had come far too quick for his pull shot and deflected away to the third man boundary
fuller delivery outside off, left alone
beautifully done, it was a touch too full on off stump and Mushy has punched it down the ground. Relies on his timing to get him his first boundary
back of a length and outside off, shoulders arms to it
fuller delivery angled in on off stump, Mushy gets forward to defend
back of a length on off stump, defended
good length ball on off stump, kept out
goes short for the last ball before the break and Mushy gets under it
back of a length and outside off, easily left
back of a length on off stump, defended
goes around the wicket and sends down a yorker on leg stump, Mahmudullah manages to nudge it towards the leg side
back of a length on leg stump, tucked to short leg
through one of the two gullies, it would seem. Chatara is not pleased wit the fielder's effort as he fails to get down in time to stop Mahmudullah collecting a glide to the third man boundary
goes short, but it only sits up for Mahmudullah to swivel on his back foot and pull to the fine leg boundary. Crisply, and simply done
fullish and shaping away outside off, Mushy shoulders arms and looks up at the umpire signalling a rather big no-ball
free hit time and it is a slower ball just outside off. Mushy had backed away to try and slap it through the covers and had gone at the ball too hard. Inside edges and it barely moves past the pitch
back of a length and thuds into Mushy. A little too much movement back in for him as he gets struck below the stomach
fuller delivery on middle and leg, clipped away to deep fine leg
shortish and outside off, Mahmudullah stands up tall behind it and cracks it through the covers. Sublime shot
dug in short, but it gains a bit too much height. Mahmudullah is comfortable ducking under it and collects a wide
good length ball outside off, with just a hint of shape away as well. Mahmudullah was rooted to the crease as he plays that back-foot punch again. This time he is beaten
digs it in short again, Mahmudullah is not interested
can't pierce the gap at point as he cuts a short and wide delivery
another cut and this time he gets a thick outside edge that lobs the first slip fielder. Can't even call that a reflex catch with how quickly the ball went over his head
flighted on off stump, driven down to long-off
backs away and punches a flatter delivery off middle stump to cover
flighted on middle, defended
skidder goes through Mahmudullah. Very lucky that the line was a few inches outside off
back of a length and outside off, not bothered with
shortish on middle and leg, Mushy nudges to short leg
worked into the midwicket region as Mushy stands up tall behind a shortish ball

caught down the leg side! It was a fuller ball and slanted down. Mushy goes for the leg glance but seems to have feathered an edge through. It's not quite clear. The umpires double-check on the front foot and it's all fine. Mushy though walked off with a shake of the head and a wry smile
walks at the bowler and Chatara does not like that. Flings down a bouncer and forces Sabbir to duck. Too much height on it for the umpire to let it go though
shortish on off stump, Sabbir taps it towards gully
brilliant delivery from around the stumps! It pitched on middle and moved on with the angle across the right-hander, who was caught in the crease. He adjusts quite late and drops his wrists
pushed through on middle and leg, defended
flighted outside off, pushed through into the covers
steps forward and drives at a fuller delivery through the covers
fuller delivery on middle stump, defended
brings Sabbir forward with a quicker, fuller delivery on off stump. Blocked
opens the face as he leans into a flighted ball outside off and hits to cover
banged in short from around the wicket, Mahmudullah looks to pull but is too quick for him
shortish on off stump, Mahmudullah blocks with soft hands
cuts him in half as a shortish delivery cuts back in to beat Mahmudullah between bat and body. Those feet barely moved
fuller delivery pushed quite a bit across the right-hander, easily left alone
moves back over the wicket and Mahmudullah is able to ride a short delivery through point
shortish and outside off, Mahmudullah taps in front of point
flighted on off stump, lunges forward to defend
goes back to a shortish delivery that comes in with the angle and he clips through midwicket
pushed through on the pads, Sabbir pushes to long-on to raise the hundred
some aggression from Mahmudullah as he swipes at a fuller ball on leg stump and sends it away over wide mid-on. Not perfectly hit, but enough
goes back to block a shortish delivery outside off
stands up tall behind a shortish delivery on middle and punches into the covers
shortish and outside off, steered in front of point to pick up a single

goes short and makes him drag it from outside off if he wants to pull. That is exactly what Sabbir does and gets a couple of runs to midiwcket. Barely in control of that though as it skewed up in the air
back of a length on off stump, defended
dug in short and Mahmudullah is happy to let it sail through
punched down the ground to the long-off boundary. Strong bottom hand powers the shortish ball and it skims away
finishes his spell with a good short ball that has Sabbir hopping around. The batsman does quite well though, dropping his wrists and using soft hands to ensure short leg was out of the picture

oh, that was close! Short midwicket leaped to his left and stuck out a hand, but the slog from Mahmudullah has just enough power behind it to go past him and hit the midwicket boundary. Panyangara was the man
runs down the track and mis-hits to mid-on
fuller delivery on off stump, defended

dropped at short leg! He had to dive forwards and gets his fingertips to the ball. Can't quite hold on from there as Kamungozi gets a little more bounce. Mahmudllah's front foot prod had only resulted in an inside edge. Maruma might have been a bit deep there
rocks back and pulls strongly through midwicket
stays deep in his crease to block a flatter ball on off stump
good length ball on middle and leg, kept out
banged in short and that's been called wide for height as the batsman ducks under it
slower ball outside off, Mahmudullah has squeezed it away to the cover boundary. Lovely touch
that's it. Mahmudullah gets to his fifty, Bangladesh have won the series 5-0. Length ball slogged away to the midwicket boundary to spark raucous celebrations in Mirpur
